name: Tweapons
description: A weapon mod with 20 new weapons! (Numbers are weapon slots) 1-FastChainsaw 2-BFGPistol 2-Laser 6-Railgun 6-Multi_PulseRailgun 6-Railrifle 3-Double-BarrelPlasmaShotgun 4-Plasma_Quaker (There are 2 one fires red and one fire blue) 6-flame_thrower 4-flame_quaker 4-Super__Scope 4-Super_laser 8-BFGNuke 9-Infernolauncher (Enhances BFGNuke + There's a seekermissile one) 0-Dinner_Blaster (JOKE) 0-Super_Dinner_Blaster (JOKE)
